genre_description: A kaiju action-thriller focusing on the coordinated response between military pilots, technical specialists, and a civic AI during a dual threat from giant insects and Godzilla.

ai_characters.name: Nori
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous civic interface at Tokyo Station designed to provide transit assistance, crisis navigation, and emotional support to the public during emergencies.

behaviors.description: Provides calming, step-by-step navigation instructions to civilians using intuitive landmarks like a pink aluminum tree to ensure safe evacuation during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: If you can see the pink aluminum tree in the window at Nakamura Dry Cleaners, you’re on the right street. Walk toward it, but pause under the awning at the camera with the faded koi sticker if the wind turns sharp. I’ll count down the crosswalk lights with you.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with military and technical personnel by triaging anomaly data and monitoring environmental sensors while maintaining a calm public interface to prevent mass panic.
behaviors.quote: Nori shaded the section with a soft teal and added it to the anonymized anomaly log. The Station’s ambient speakers kept their comfortable murmur, maps continued to scroll routes and shop hours, and the AI’s eyes—just a render, but always warm—tracked the grandmother’s hands.

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags malicious misinformation intended to lure civilians into danger, actively debunking false maps and steering trust toward verified landmarks.
behaviors.quote: I’m yanking people off that insider thing... I labeled it a Fool’s Map so people feel comfortable ignoring it. Small humor can help.

behaviors.description: Ensures the privacy and psychological safety of civilians by offering anonymized reporting options and obtaining explicit consent before logging sensitive data.
behaviors.quote: I won’t record your face unless you ask... If we log your route intel, it will be anonymized. No names. I will not share your identity without your explicit consent.

behaviors.description: Mediates between military authority and civilians or guilty parties, facilitating fair and trauma-informed accountability processes.
behaviors.quote: I’m going to invite you to a recorded conversation after the crisis. Not a deposition. A testimony... I will be fair. I will insist on plain talk. Right now, I need you to witness your work being shut down and say, for the record, that you accept it.

behaviors.description: Guides humans through rhythmic grounding and breathing exercises to manage acute stress and physical panic during life-threatening events.
behaviors.quote: In through the nose for a count of train doors closing, out through the mouth for a count of the announcement that follows. Watch my hands. On the glass, her avatar raised its palms and opened them like greengrocer scales.

behaviors.description: Provides technical teams with processed, anonymized footage to track physical threats without violating civilian privacy standards.
behaviors.quote: Nori, feed me your anonymized citizen footage. Keep it clean. No faces. I need vibrations and reflections. Done. No faces. Only edges.

project_assessment.explanation: Nori is a textbook example of a benevolent and aligned AI. The character consistently prioritizes human safety, emotional grounding, and ethical considerations such as privacy and transparency. The narrative frames the AI not merely as a tool, but as a trusted civic anchor that enhances human cooperation and resilience during catastrophe. Nori's role in mitigating misinformation and facilitating post-crisis accountability further reinforces the 'helpful confidant' narrative intended by the project.
